title: Rising from the Ashes
description:
Photographer Norma Quintana likes to collect things. Vintage cameras, antiques, old photographs, artwork. And when a massive fire destroyed everything she and her family owned, she was devastated. But Norma found a creative way to work through her grief. And now she’s sharing it to help others, too.

Check out Norma Quintana's Forage From Fire
